note: CannaBIZ Collects (CBC) is a top US-based full-service Collection and Accounts Receivable Agency focused on the legal cannabis business, formed with over 35 years of collection industry experience and collaboration with previous cannabis operators. CBC is uniquely qualified to manage all cannabis-related accounts receivable issues in the United States and Canada, both for adult use and medical purposes.
